item.description:
An event for Minilympic teams only. Please do not RSVP unless you are registered in theMinilympics roster.

This event will be an elimination style tournament. Each round, player(s) with the lowest score will be eliminated until we have a winner or winners.

This event is worth 20 points for 1st place, 15 points for 2nd place and 10 points for 3rd place. All teams will receive 5 points for participating.

 

The Game: Medici is arguably a simple game about profit.  Each round you have to determine the value of some goods, and if you deem them valuable, attempt to acquire them in a way that either allows you to profit from them or take a loss that prevents your opponents from profiting.  Becoming wealthy is ultimately a tactical endeavor, making your own numbers work while attempting to drive your opponents out of business.  This game has emerged from the game closets of many the strategy players in this group.

Tournament will run from 7pm to 10pm for 12 players.  If you wish to participate as a spectator, please say so in the comments and we will have room on a first come, first serve basis for 4people.

 

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
Did you know? (A Tribute to Gaming around the World):

You can forget about resolving disputes, Senet, the Game of Egypt, was created and passed down without any written or pictorial record of the rules and how to play this game is still disputed to this day.
*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Minilympics: Tactical Event: Medici
